column2: Send a delegation to §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! to petition that [Root.GetSheHe] allow you into the North Atlantic Treaty Organization...
Has not asked §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! to join NATO in the last 12 months
§Y[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! does not control all of its territory
The citizens of §Y[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! aren't allowed to vote
The citizens of §Y[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! are allowed to vote
§Y[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! is in a state of war
§Y[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! is not in the North Atlantic area

To the [GetFromFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName], I find it imperative that you consider my great country's application to join NATO. We would be steadfast defenders of democratic interests...

With warmest regards,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],

Thank you for the intriguing proposal. We accept your invitation to NATO and a delegation of our representatives shall be on their way shortly.

With warmest regards,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],

While I am flattered by your interest, I must respectfully decline your request at this time.

Regards,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetFirstName],

I am surprised that you would even send such a request considering the state of your 'country'. We will not process your application at this time.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
